poem:
### The Downsizing

Among the desks,  
a nation redefines—  
slimming the weight,  
slicing the spine  
of what was known,  
but keeping the lines  
where students sign—  
a ledger molded,  
yet unbroken,  
balancing hopes  
on pared down edges,  
a whisper of futures  
still clinging to  
the stripped-bare hallways.
